long_desc: A large sign mounted on a pole is standing by the roadside.

extra_descriptions.description:
Not the most interesting pole in the world.
Better leave it here, though, as it holds the sign in place.

It says :-

                         Haon-Dor
                         --------

 This is the Forest of Haon-Dor.  Enter at your own risk.
     Please report any strange occurrences to Furry,
     as Quifael and Derkhil are currently indisposed.
